title: My poro snacks lover icon doesnt seem to work
body: It says you do not have it when I try to use it in game.

replies.body: You'll need to have the icon selected as your choice in order for the emote to work.  Congrats!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IUM1Nmk8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-15T00:03:34.905+0000)
>
> You'll need to have the icon selected as your choice in order for the emote to work.  Congrats!

It works in aram but not in the poro king mode
